data.title: Cheap Flights & All Inclusive Vacations from Calgary
data.meta_description: Calgary's travel deal community.  Find cheap flights, holiday packages, and all inclusive vacations from YYC.  Featuring articles, guides, alerts, forums, discount promo codes, sales and more.
data.text:
2024

25

August

Calgary to Rome, Italy - $610 to $723 CAD roundtrip including taxes | Nonstop Flights

WestJet has dropped the price of their April flights from Calgary to Rome, Italy down to between $610 and $723 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights are nonstop both ways.

UPDATE - A few dates are available in late October to mid November for $673 roundtrip. WestJet's cheapest fares to Europe (and Asia) still include carry-on.

Availability for travel

April, May, October, November 2024

April 2025

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with the following Google Flights search:

Google Flights: Calgary to Rome, Italy

[2024]

Google Flights: Calgary to Rome, Italy

[2025]

- Click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view.

- Browse for cheap date combinations by adjusting the trip length at the bottom.

- Look for the dates that are $663-$748 roundtrip.

2. Go to Skyscanner or FlightHub or Kayak

3. Search for a flight from Calgary (YYC) to Rome, Italy (FCO)

- Try the same dates you found on Google Flights.

- Cheapest dates to try...

Oct 20 to Oct 28, Nov 6, 8, 10, 15, 17

Oct 21 to Oct 28, Nov 6, 8, 10, 15, 17

Oct 22 to Oct 28, Nov 6, 8, 10, 15, 17

screenshot from Skyscanner

Sign up for YYC Deals Alerts from Calgary

Go to the Alerts Page to sign up for flight deal alerts by e-mail, Facebook, or Twitter.

Travellers from Calgary also often sign up for alerts from Edmonton and Vancouver.

Join us in the YYC Deals Facebook Group

For live discussion of this deal, or to get some amazing travel advice (about anywhere) from your 50,000 fellow passengers in Calgary, join us in the:

YYC Deals Facebook Group.

^^^ click the 'Join Group' button when you arrive.

Hit Like if you like this deal! Click Share to show your friends on Facebook.
